name: Traveler
message: It's okay, I know you have suffered a lot

name: Ragged child
message: Normally people don't care about children in this zone, the lack of money make impossible for kids to live in good conditions

name: Traveler
message: You are the first kid I've seen in this place, there are more?

name: Ragged child
message: There are a lot, but most of us preffer to be hidden

name: Ragged child
message: Life have never been easy, but nowadays it seems like we struggle more and more, money is everything in this city

name: Ragged child
message: If you don't produce you aren't useful, and if you don't have money you have no voice or power

name: Traveler
message: That's crazy, how could that be... I'm trying to find out what happened here, It's been a long time since I visit Valdir

name: Ragged child
message: I wish you a lot of luck with that, maybe you can find out more about what happened in the workers zone

name: Traveler
message: Thank you I'll go there now then, be safe kid

name: ERROR
message: If you're seeing this message something bad happened
